author: Damien Gallagher MoMo
title: Becoming the Lead: Part 1 - Kernel of Hope
introduction: From High School to university life, seventeen-year-old Kang Jihoon navigates social dynamics with convenience store popcorn and practiced invisibility.
author_comment: Wow it sounds amazing. And you chose such a great voice that I feel fits Jihoon well. The level of help and patience you have just proved how much you and your team has worked on this software to help people like myself who need the helping hand to bring my story to life.
